title: Keep Your Pets Warm
description: Provide cozy blankets and warm bedding during the winter months to keep your pets comfortable.

title: Regular Grooming
description: Brush your pets regularly to prevent mats and tangles, which can trap cold air near the skin.

title: Protect Their Paws
description: Use pet-safe booties or paw balm to protect against ice, snow, and salt.

title: Monitor Indoor Temperature
description: Keep indoor areas warm but well-ventilated to prevent respiratory issues.

title: Hydration is Important
description: Ensure pets always have access to fresh water, as winter air can be dehydrating.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Avoid long outdoor walks in freezing temperatures and always supervise your pets.
